input-forms.form-definitions:
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title of the item. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc date manuscript false Date Manuscript Completed date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc date issued false Date degree awarded date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc thesis degree false Degree Awarded dropdown
You must select a Degree Award
dc contributor author true Authors name Enter the author(s) of this work. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter an author
dc contributor advisor true Advisor/Supervisor/Committee Chair name Enter your primary advisor(s), not your entire committee. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter an advisor
dc contributor committeeMember true Committee Members name Include up to 10 names. Do not include degrees as part of the name.
dc subject
true Subject Category onebox Select approriate subjects. You must enter a subject subjects
ou group
false Department/College dropdown
You must select an option.
dc description abstract false Abstract textarea Enter the abstract of the item. You must enter an abstract
dc language
false Primary Language dropdown Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'.
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc date manuscript false Date Manuscript Completed date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc date issued false Date degree awarded date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc thesis degree false Degree Awarded dropdown
You must select a degree.
dc contributor author true Authors name Enter the author(s) of this work. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter an author
shareok orcid
false Author ORCID ID onebox Enter the ORCID ID corresponding to the primary author of this work.
dc contributor advisor true Advisor/Supervisor/Committee Chair name Enter your primary advisor(s), not your entire committee. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter an advisor
dc contributor committeeMember true Committee Members name Include up to 10 names. Do not include degrees as part of the name.
dc subject
true Subject Category onebox Choose 3-4 clear, accurate, descriptive subect terms. Think about the keywords that you would use to find material related to your dissertation topic, and include the closest subject terms. You must enter a subject subjects
ou group
false Department/College dropdown Select the name of your academic unit. You must select an option.
dc description abstract false Abstract textarea Enter the abstract of the item below. Within your abstract, repeat keywords or phrases from your dissertation title, reuse relevant keywords, and include other keywords or phrases you would use to find material related to your dissertation topic. You must enter an abstract
dc language
false Primary Language dropdown Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'.
shareok nativefileaccess
true Access to Original Documents list Should access to original document files (non-PDF) be restricted?
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title of the item. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc date issued false Date of Publication date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc subject
true Subject Category onebox Select approriate subjects.
ou course dept false Course Department onebox Enter the department code for the course.
ou course number false Course Number onebox Enter the course number.
ou faculty
true Faculty Member name Enter the OU course faculty member or sponsor.
ou teacher
true Teacher name Enter teacher, instructor, Lecturer, or GA.
dc contributor author true Author name Enter the author(s) of this work. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter a creator
ou hometown
false Author Hometown onebox Enter the author's hometown.
ou homestate
false Author Home State onebox Enter the author's home state.
ou homecountry
false Author Home Country onebox Enter the author's home country.
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title of the item. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc date issued false Date of Publication date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must enter at least the year.
dc contributor author true Author name Enter the author(s) of this work. Do not include degrees as part of the name. You must enter a creator
ou group
false Department/College dropdown
dc type
true Type dropdown Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
dc description peerreview false Peer Reviewed list Was this work peer reviewed?
dc description peerreviewnotes false Peer Review Notes textarea Enter a brief description of the nature of peer review for this work.
dc identifier doi true DOI onebox DOI
dc identifier citation false Citation onebox Enter the standard citation for this item.
dc relation ispartofseries true Series/Report No. series Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.
dc subject
true Subject Category onebox Enter subjects.
subjects
dc description abstract false Abstract textarea Enter the abstract of the item.
dc description sponsorship false Sponsor Notes textarea Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.
dc description
false Description textarea Record any additional notes pertaining to the resource.
dc language
false Primary Language dropdown Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'.
// citizen science
dc title
false Sample ID onebox Enter the Sample ID of the item. You must enter Sample ID for this item.
dc npdg internalcode false Internal Code onebox
dc date issued false Date Collected date
You must enter at least the year.
dc npdg datereceived false Date Received date You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
dc npdg homecity false City onebox
You must select a City
dc npdg homestate false State dropdown
You must select a State
dc npdg homezip false Zip onebox Enter the zip.
dc coverage spatial false Coordinates onebox
dc npdg screenstatus false Screen Status onebox Enter screen status. You must enter screen status
dc npdg isolatesRBM false # of isolates from RBM onebox Enter # of isolates from RBM
dc npdg isolatesTV8 false # of isolates from TV8 onebox Enter # of isolates from TV8.
dc npdg fungismallscale false Fungi for Small Scale onebox Enter Fungi for Small Scale
dc description
false Collection Detail textarea
dc npdg signature true Signature list
